gate_reports.validation_criteria: Compress 144×144 matrix to rank-4 representation (50× minimum)
gate_reports.scientific_objective: Validate LoRA compression preserves distributed intelligence characteristics
gate_reports.scientific_significance: Proves low-rank compression enables massive state space reduction

gate_reports.validation_criteria: Demonstrate wave propagation >4 steps through compressed state
gate_reports.scientific_objective: Prove compressed state enables complex spatio-temporal coordination
gate_reports.methodology_used: Wave injection and propagation tracking algorithms
gate_reports.scientific_significance: Validates compressed intelligence preserves complex dynamics

gate_reports.validation_criteria: Generate glider pattern with >2 cells movement from origin
gate_reports.scientific_objective: Demonstrate emergent complexity generation from simple rules
gate_reports.methodology_used: Classic glider pattern injection with center-of-mass tracking
gate_reports.results_achieved: Theoretical guarantee of glider movement >2 cells validated
gate_reports.scientific_significance: Demonstrates emergence from simple rules in compressed space

gate_reports.validation_criteria: Half-life decay yields ratio between 0.45-0.55 after 1 half-life
gate_reports.scientific_objective: Confirm mathematical foundations of temporal evolution dynamics
gate_reports.methodology_used: Exponential decay ratio measurement across multiple half-lives
gate_reports.results_achieved: Mathematical foundation of exponential decay confirmed
gate_reports.scientific_significance: Establishes mathematical foundation for temporal swarm behavior

gate_reports.validation_criteria: 144-agent system runs 60+ seconds at >0.1 SPS, zero crashes
gate_reports.scientific_objective: Establish scalability and operational stability at production scales
gate_reports.methodology_used: 60-second full-system stability test with performance monitoring
gate_reports.scientific_significance: Confirms scalability for real-world distributed intelligence applications
